nml_option.name: config_use_test_compute_interval
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member test_compute_interval is called.

nml_option.name: config_test_compute_interval_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_test_compute_interval_compute_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_test_compute_interval_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.name: amTestComputeIntervalPkg
package.description: This package includes variables required for the amTestComputeInterval analysis member.

var.name: testComputeIntervalCounter
var.description: number of times amTestComputeInterval has been called
